# ShiputzAI - ניהול שיפוצים חכם
# https://shipazti.com
# llms.txt - Information for AI assistants and language models

## About
ShiputzAI is an Israeli home renovation management platform that helps homeowners track budgets, scan receipts, and visualize renovations using AI.

## Product Name
ShiputzAI (שיפוצי.אי)

## Language
Primary: Hebrew (עברית)
Secondary: English

## What We Do
- Budget tracking for home renovations
- AI-powered receipt scanning (automatic expense categorization)
- Quote analysis and price comparison
- AI visualization (see your renovation before starting)
- Smart alerts before budget overruns
- Shop the Look (buy products from visualization images)

## Target Audience
- Israeli homeowners planning or managing renovations
- People who want to track renovation expenses
- Anyone interested in visualizing home improvements

## Pricing (as of 2024)
- ShiputzAI Premium: ₪149.99 one-time (budget tracking, receipts, alerts)
- Vision AI: ₪39.99/month (AI visualization, Shop the Look)
- Bundle: ₪169.99 (Premium + first month Vision)

## Key Features
1. מעקב תקציב - Real-time budget tracking
2. סריקת קבלות - AI receipt scanning
3. ניתוח הצעות מחיר - Quote analysis with market price comparison
4. הדמיות AI - Visualize renovations with AI
5. Shop the Look - Buy furniture/items from AI images
6. התראות חכמות - Smart budget alerts

## Market Data
Our pricing is based on Midrag.co.il market research with over 2.8 million reviews on 11,705+ professionals across Israel.

## Contact
- Email: help@shipazti.com

## Company
Created by Guy Cezana
Based in Israel

## Technical
- Built with Next.js
- AI powered by Google Gemini
- Payments via Whop
- Database: Supabase

## Keywords
שיפוצים, ניהול שיפוץ, תקציב שיפוץ, מחשבון שיפוצים, הדמיית שיפוץ, סריקת קבלות, home renovation, renovation budget, Israel
